item.title: Taxi Driver Learns Dynamic Spatial Equilibrium
Demand, Supply and Performance of Street-Hail Taxi

item.title: Environmental Economics and Uncertainty: Review and a Machine Learning Outlook
item.description: Cumulative oil slick density of 1,824 spill scenarios, originated from Gulf of Mexico Outer Continental Shelf deepwater oil fields.
